title: Apply for a tax disc refund (form V14)

details.description: Fill in form V14 and send to DVLA to apply for a vehicle tax disc refund
details.more_information:
Check that you’re entitled to a refund first - the details are at the start of the form.

You’ll need to fill in your personal details exactly as they’re shown on your Registration Certificate (V5C).

If you don’t have your tax disc, you’ll need to use form V33. You can get a form by contacting DVLA customer enquiries or from a DVLA local office.

DVLA customer enquiries
0300 790 6802
details.introduction: Download and print the vehicle tax disc (vehicle licence) refund form V14. Fill it in and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.
expectations: Details of your current Blue Badge, if you have one
